headings.text: We Make AI Work For You

main_content: Welcome to Phoenix Technologies Phoenix Technologies is a Swiss-based AI and cloud service provider, delivering sovereign, high-performance computing solutions designed for enterprises requiring scalability, security, and data sovereignty. Our fully integrated, turnkey AI and cloud environments ensure compliance with strict data governance regulations, making us the only sovereign provider of high-end AI infrastructure in Switzerland. Our Vision At Phoenix Technologies, we aspire to be the trusted catalyst for business transformation, enabling our clients to harness the full potential of AI. We're c﻿ommitted to enabling enterprises with cloud solutions for mission-critical applications while fostering a culture of pioneering visions, continuous learning, and skill development Our Values Inquisitive and integrity-driven We explore new possibilities with an open mind while maintaining unwavering honesty, transparency, and responsibility. Empathic and Supportive We connect with people through genuine understanding and provide thoughtful, proactive support to help them thrive. Growth-oriented We embrace continuous learning and improvement, driving progress that creates lasting value and positive impact. Our Offices Phoenix Technologies is a Swiss leader in AI and cloud solutions, ensuring digital sovereignty and innovation with a strong commitment to security and compliance. With offices in Zürich’s Technopark and Basel’s uptownBasel, we leverage these dynamic ecosystems because we believe in collaboration and sharing knowledge to drive technological progress.
